name: fishbowl (Erika Verkaaik)
description:
FISHBOWL
bright scales glistening,
darting amongst the cold stones:
a parallel world.

~
a digital diorama of a fishbowl
originally created in 5 days by @erikaverkaaik
for the Make-A-Thing Jan 2017 Jam
winner of the "best game art"

Update coming soon!! Please see dev blog for more info.
